description.value:
The wielder breathes in, before exhaling a stream of breath laced with virulent aether. Each creature in the area must roll [[/r 1d8]] on the table below to see what affects it, then attempt a saving throw of the indicated type. The table notes any additional traits that apply to each type of status. If a creature is struck by multiple effects, it uses the same d20 result for all its saving throws. For all effects, a successful saving throw negates the effect for that creature.

  1. @Check[fortitude|against:spell] (poison); @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} for 1 minute; or Sickened 2 on a critical failure.
  2. @Check[will|against:spell]; @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute.
  3. @Check[fortitude|against:spell] (poison); @Damage[3d6[persistent,force]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute.
  4. @Check[will|against:spell|traits:incapacitation] (sleep, incapacitation); The target falls asleep
  5. @Check[will|against:spell]; @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute; or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3} for 1 round and then Slowed 1 for 1 minute on a critical failure.
  6. @Check[will|against:spell] (mental); @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, as per the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]{@Localize[AIE.SpellNames.7th.WarpMind]} spell.
  7. @Check[fortitude|against:spell]; Unable to cast spells or use effects with the auditory trait for 1 minute
  8. No Save; Roll twice, ignoring any duplicates and rerolling additional rolls of 8

Heightened (8th) Each creature affected must roll twice and take both results.

Heightened (10th) Each creature affected must roll three times and take all results.
